import React from 'react' import io from "socket.io-client" import '../styles/Chat.css' import { useState } from 'react' io.connect('http://localhost:3001') const Chat = () => { const[name,setName]=useState('') const[room,setRoom]=useState('') return (
{setName(e.target.value)}} value={name}> {setRo(e.target.value)}} >
{name}
) } export default Chat
